title: Gasoline prices drop below $3 per gallon to hit lowest level since 2021
description: Gas prices hit their lowest level in four years as the national average fell to just under $3 per gallon this week.
content:
Gasoline prices fell just below $3.00 per gallon this week, their lowest level since 2021.
As of Wednesday, at least 30 states saw an average the $3 mark at the pump, according to AAA data, as lower… [+2004 chars]
